comments:
When I try to set the persistence product with Generic EJB3 or Hibernate EJB3, 
I have the following error message :

With Generic EJB3

Unexpected error
Could not set Persistence Product
Reason org.eclipse.jsr220orm.generic.GenericEntityModelManagerfor product:
Generic EJB 3 Persistence (1.0) could not be initialized :
java null pointer exception.

With Hibernate EJB3.0

Unexpected error
Could not set Persistence Product
Reason org.eclipse.jsr220orm.generic.GenericEntityModelManagerfor product:
Hibernate EJB3.0 (J2SE) Persistence (1.0) could not be initialized :
java null pointer exception.
